section1.title: Basic Arithmetic Operators
section1.content: a + b \quad a - b \quad a \times b \quad a \div b

section8.title: Braces and Matrices
section8.content: \{ x \in \mathbb{R} \mid x > 0 \} \quad \begin{bmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{bmatrix}

section9.title: Relational Symbols
section9.content: a \leq b \quad a \geq b \quad a \neq b \quad a \approx b

section11.title: Logical Symbols
section11.content: \forall x \in X, \quad \exists y \in Y, \quad x \Rightarrow y \quad x \Leftrightarrow y

section15.title: Function Definitions and Interval Notation
section15.content: f(x) = \begin{cases} x^2 & \text{if } x \geq 0 \\ -x & \text{if } x < 0 \end{cases} \quad [a, b] \quad (a, b)
